title: Turkey Capital Flows
description: Turkey recorded a capital and financial account deficit of 357 USD Million in September of 2022. Capital Flows in Turkey averaged -1525.70 USD Million from 1991 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 6755 USD Million in August of 2018 and a record low of -13831 USD Million in December of 2021. This page provides - Turkey Capital Flows- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey
